Package net.sf.jstuff.core.security.acl

Class DelegatingSecurityManager

java.lang.Object
java.lang.SecurityManager
net.sf.jstuff.core.security.acl.NoOpSecurityManager
net.sf.jstuff.core.security.acl.DelegatingSecurityManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
DelegatingSecurityManagerWithThreadLocalControl
@Deprecated public class DelegatingSecurityManager extends NoOpSecurityManager
Deprecated.
Security manager that delegates all method invocations to the wrapped security manager instance.
Author:
Sebastian Thomschke
